about_the_game:
"

FG Medieval Buildings 2 Map Pack


The Medieval Buildings 2  Map Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This art package consists of many premade classic medieval buildings along with village decorations and brushes. This pack includes the following items:

  • Decorations include many premade buildings, structures, incidental village items, and more
  • Brushes include fortification walls, wooden bridges and more
"
detailed_description:
"

FG Medieval Buildings 2 Map Pack


The Medieval Buildings 2  Map Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This art package consists of many premade classic medieval buildings along with village decorations and brushes. This pack includes the following items:

  • Decorations include many premade buildings, structures, incidental village items, and more
  • Brushes include fortification walls, wooden bridges and more
"

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
